creator: Chiliz.com
descriptionHtml:
Crazy about football? Want to influence what happens with your favorite club? Download Socios.com to take part in exclusive, club-specific polls and make your voice heard.

Get closer to the teams you love by collecting your club's Fan Tokens. Fan Tokens can be traded, earned or hunted. The more you own, the more influential you'll be when it comes to voting.

As a Socios.com member, you'll benefit from unique rewards, exclusive merchandise, and exceptional, once-in-a-lifetime experiences. You can enjoy prediction games, match-day challenges, leaderboards and much more.

Fan Tokens can be traded via the app's Marketplace.

"Socios.com will have an important impact on the Club's overall business strategy and the way we engage with our fanbase." Marc Armstrong, Chief Partnerships Officer, Paris Saint-Germain

"Together with Socios.com, we believe that we can offer new opportunities to our worldwide fan base to engage in cutting-edge way with their favorite club." Giorgio Ricci, Co-Chief Revenue Officer, Head of Global Partnerships & Global Revenues, Juventus

"We're very excited about the possibilities Socios.com offers us to give fans the best experience possible, whether they live within a mile of the stadium or thousands of miles away." Karim Virania, Digital & Commercial Director, West Ham United

As featured in Forbes, El Pais, The Telegraph, The Sun, Reuters, Le Figaro, L'Equipe, El Espanol, Talk Sport, 90 Min.

It's more than a game. Be more than a fan. Download Socios.com to have your say.

title: Socios.com - Be More Than A Fan

container.value:
HX Entertainment
East 14 - Level 7 - Gzira Street
Gzira GZR1000
Malta

creator: Chiliz.com
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Socios.com, a fans’ favorite place to influence the decision-making of sports teams, access VIP experiences, compete for rewards, trade digital tokens & chat with other fans.
Socios.com is the proud partner of football clubs FC Barcelona, Juventus, Paris Saint-Germain, Atletico de Madrid, Galatasaray, AS Roma, Club Atletico Independiente, Apollon Limassol, Trabzonspor, Sint Truidense V.V., Young Boys, Novara Calcio, Universidad de Chile; esports teams OG, Team Heretics, Natus Vincere, Team Alliance, as well as the UFC & the PFL.
Whether it’s voting for a jersey-design, picking dressing-room artwork, choosing a new goal celebration or match-day music, or even picking the team formation of a friendly match, you’ll need the team’s Fan Tokens to cast your vote. Our partners have made a commitment to put their fans at the heart of everything they do. That means they’ll be asking you - their fans - to have their say on club-related decisions.


Want to meet your heroes? Want to experience matchday as a VIP? It’s all here. We have a unique relationship with our partners, which means we create tailor-made, once-in-a-lifetime experiences for fans.


Fan Tokens tokens also act as your digital pass to participate in competitions, attend exclusive team events, earn team rewards like signed merchandise, take a VIP seat at the stadium, test your team knowledge in trivia challenges, access cashback offers & much more.


Fan Tokens can be freely traded with other Socios.com users and some Fan Tokens can also be traded on third-party exchanges.


There’s games, quizzes, chat as well as our super cool augmented reality feature Token Hunt, where you can virtually grab tokens for free.


You can even pledge support for teams you want to add to the Socios.com community through our Locker Rooms.


The more you use Socios.com, the more points you’ll accumulate. These points all count towards your Fan Power Leaderboard score, which in turn means more team-exclusive prizes. Your points get converted into $SSU loyalty tokens, that you can use in the Socios.com shop to get exclusive merch, experiences & more.
It's more than a game. Be more than a fan. Download Socios.com and get started!

HX Entertainment
East 14 - Level 7 - Gzira Street
Gzira GZR1000
Malta

creator: Chiliz.com
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Socios.com, a fans’ favorite place to influence the decision-making of sports teams, access VIP experiences, compete for rewards, trade digital tokens & chat with other fans.
Socios.com is the proud partner of football clubs FC Barcelona, Juventus, Paris Saint-Germain, Atletico de Madrid, Galatasaray, AS Roma, Club Atletico Independiente, Apollon Limassol, Trabzonspor, Sint Truidense V.V., Young Boys, Novara Calcio, Universidad de Chile; esports teams OG, Team Heretics, Natus Vincere, Team Alliance, as well as the UFC & the PFL.
Whether it’s voting for a jersey-design, picking dressing-room artwork, choosing a new goal celebration or match-day music, or even picking the team formation of a friendly match, you’ll need the team’s Fan Tokens to cast your vote. Our partners have made a commitment to put their fans at the heart of everything they do. That means they’ll be asking you - their fans - to have their say on club-related decisions.


Want to meet your heroes? Want to experience matchday as a VIP? It’s all here. We have a unique relationship with our partners, which means we create tailor-made, once-in-a-lifetime experiences for fans.


Fan Tokens also act as your digital pass to participate in competitions, attend exclusive team events, earn team rewards like signed merchandise, take a VIP seat at the stadium, test your team knowledge in trivia challenges, access cashback offers & much more.


Fan Tokens can be freely traded with other Socios.com users and some Fan Tokens can also be traded on third-party exchanges.


There’s games, quizzes, chat as well as our super cool augmented reality feature Token Hunt, where you can virtually grab tokens for free.


You can even pledge support for teams you want to add to the Socios.com community through our Locker Rooms.


The more you use Socios.com, the more points you’ll accumulate. These points all count towards your Fan Power Leaderboard score, which in turn means more team-exclusive prizes. Your points get converted into $SSU loyalty tokens, that you can use in the Socios.com shop to get exclusive merch, experiences & more.
It's more than a game. Be more than a fan. Download Socios.com and get started!

title: Socios.com - Be More Than A Fan

container.value:
HX Entertainment
East 14 - Level 7 - Gzira Street
Gzira GZR1000
Malta

creator: Chiliz.com
descriptionHtml:
Download the first fan influence app & get your favourite team's Fan Token. Influence, play & win once in a lifetime experiences.
Our app lets fans get closer than ever to the world's most prestigious Football, Esports, Basketball, Motorsport and MMA organisations. Together with our Global Brand Ambassador, Lionel Messi, we will inspire fans worldwide to come together and share their passion for their favourite teams.

More than a hundred sports teams use the Socios.com app to get closer and empower fans from all over the globe. Our roster of teams includes Paris Saint-Germain F.C, F.C Barcelona, Manchester City, Juventus, AC Milan, F.C Internazionale Milano, Galatasaray, Vitality, La Lakers, Golden State Warriors, Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team, UFC, and more will probably join by the time you finish reading this.

Fan Tokens
Fan Tokens are digital assets that can be acquired on the Socios.com app. They give passionate fans like you a voice and the power to influence team decisions, play exclusive games and win incredible once in a lifetime experiences. It all starts with one Fan Token.

Influence
From having the final say on your favourite football team's new home kit, motorsport helmet design, and MMA main event, Fan Tokens allow you to be more than a fan by giving you unprecedented access.

Since 2018, our partners have trusted Fan Token holders with over 400 official team decisions.

Play
They say life is not all fun and games. Well, we didn't get the memo here at Socios.com. With exclusive features such as Token Hunt, Socios Predictor, and daily quizzes, we promise to keep you busy all day long.

Every time you engage with the app, you earn XP points; these help you level up, climb leaderboards, earn badges and SSU Loyalty Tokens.

Win
You know, that dream you have, the one that includes you playing at iconic stadiums like Camp Nou? Well, with Fan Tokens, that can become a reality.

But that's not all. As a Fan Token holder, you get to participate in exclusive in-app competitions and win VIP tickets to matches and events all year long. Signed memorabilia, meet & greets, and other exclusive experiences are also part of the package. All it takes is one Fan Token.

Fan Rewards
At Socios.com, your loyalty means everything. That's why we've created Fan Rewards. A feature that allows engaged fans to redeem exclusive experiences, VIP tickets, signed merchandise, and more via SSU Loyalty Tokens.

You can collect SSU Loyalty Tokens for free via our augmented reality feature Token Hunt and earn even more by levelling up.

Digital & Physical Collectibles
If you're a fan of digital collectibles, memorabilia and other collectibles? We've got you covered. Take part in special promotions to get your hands on unique Socios and team digital collectibles, rare memorabilia and more.

Ready to be more than a fan? Download the Socios.com App and get your first Fan Token now.

More than a hundred sports teams use the Socios.com app to get closer and empower fans from all over the globe. Our roster of teams includes Paris Saint-Germain F.C, F.C Barcelona, Manchester City, Juventus, AC Milan, F.C Internazionale Milano, Galatasaray, Vitality, La Lakers, Golden State Warriors, Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team, UFC, and more will probably join by the time you finish reading this.

FAN TOKENS
Fan Tokens are digital assets that can be acquired on the Socios.com app. They give passionate fans like you a voice and the power to influence team decisions, play exclusive games and win incredible once in a lifetime experiences. It all starts with one Fan Token.

INFLUENCE
From having the final say on your favourite football team's new home kit, motorsport helmet design, and MMA main event, Fan Tokens allow you to be more than a fan by giving you unprecedented access.

Since 2019, our partners have trusted Fan Token holders with over 500 official team decisions.

PLAY
They say life is not all fun and games. Well, we didn't get the memo here at Socios.com. With exclusive features such as Token Hunt, Socios Predictor, and daily quizzes, we promise to keep you busy all day long.

Every time you engage with the app, you earn XP points; these help you level up, climb leaderboards, earn badges and SSU Loyalty Tokens.

WIN
You know, that dream you have, the one that includes you playing at iconic stadiums like Camp Nou? Well, with Fan Tokens, that can become a reality.

But that's not all. As a Fan Token holder, you get to participate in exclusive in-app competitions and win VIP tickets to matches and events all year long. Signed memorabilia, meet & greets, and other exclusive experiences are also part of the package. All it takes is one Fan Token.

FAN REWARDS
At Socios.com, your loyalty means everything. That's why we've created Fan Rewards. A feature that allows engaged fans to redeem exclusive experiences, VIP tickets, signed merchandise, and more via SSU Loyalty Tokens.

You can collect SSU Loyalty Tokens for free via our augmented reality feature Token Hunt and earn even more by levelling up.

DIGITAL & PHYSICAL COLLECTIBLES
If you're a fan of digital collectibles, memorabilia and other collectibles? We've got you covered. Take part in special promotions to get your hands on unique Socios and team digital collectibles, rare memorabilia and more.

Ready to be more than a fan? Download the Socios.com App and get your first Fan Token now.

More than a hundred sports teams use the Socios.com app to get closer and empower fans from all over the globe. Our roster of teams includes Paris Saint-Germain F.C, F.C Barcelona, Manchester City, Juventus, AC Milan, F.C Internazionale Milano, Galatasaray, Vitality, La Lakers, Golden State Warriors, Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team, UFC, and more will probably join by the time you finish reading this.

FAN TOKENS
Fan Tokens are digital assets that can be acquired on the Socios.com app. They give passionate fans like you a voice and the power to influence team decisions, play exclusive games and win incredible once in a lifetime experiences. It all starts with one Fan Token.

INFLUENCE
From having the final say on your favourite football team's new home kit, motorsport helmet design, and MMA main event, Fan Tokens allow you to be more than a fan by giving you unprecedented access.

Since 2019, our partners have trusted Fan Token holders with over 500 official team decisions.

PLAY
They say life is not all fun and games. Well, we didn't get the memo here at Socios.com. With exclusive features such as Token Hunt, Socios Predictor, and daily quizzes, we promise to keep you busy all day long.

Every time you engage with the app, you earn XP points; these help you level up, climb leaderboards, earn badges and SSU Loyalty Tokens.

WIN
You know, that dream you have, the one that includes you playing at iconic stadiums like Camp Nou? Well, with Fan Tokens, that can become a reality.

But that's not all. As a Fan Token holder, you get to participate in exclusive in-app competitions and win VIP tickets to matches and events all year long. Signed memorabilia, meet & greets, and other exclusive experiences are also part of the package. All it takes is one Fan Token.

FAN REWARDS
At Socios.com, your loyalty means everything. That's why we've created Fan Rewards. A feature that allows engaged fans to redeem exclusive experiences, VIP tickets, signed merchandise, and more via SSU Loyalty Tokens.

You can collect SSU Loyalty Tokens for free via our augmented reality feature Token Hunt and earn even more by levelling up.

DIGITAL & PHYSICAL COLLECTIBLES
If you're a fan of digital collectibles, memorabilia and other collectibles? We've got you covered. Take part in special promotions to get your hands on unique Socios and team digital collectibles, rare memorabilia and more.

Ready to be more than a fan? Download the Socios.com App and get your first Fan Token now.

Our roster of teams includes Paris Saint-Germain F.C, F.C Barcelona, Manchester City, Juventus, AC Milan, F.C Internazionale Milano, Galatasaray, Vitality, La Lakers, Golden State Warriors, Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team, UFC, and more will probably join by the time you finish reading this.

FAN TOKENS
Fan Tokens are digital assets that can be acquired on the Socios.com app. They give passionate fans like you a voice and the power to influence team decisions, play exclusive games and win incredible once in a lifetime experiences. It all starts with one Fan Token.

INFLUENCE
From having the final say on your favourite football team's new home kit, motorsport helmet design, and MMA main event, Fan Tokens allow you to be more than a fan by giving you unprecedented access.

Since 2019, our partners have trusted Fan Token holders with over 500 official team decisions.

PLAY
They say life is not all fun and games. Well, we didn't get the memo here at Socios.com. With exclusive features such as Token Hunt, Socios Predictor, and daily quizzes, we promise to keep you busy all day long.

Every time you engage with the app, you earn XP points; these help you level up, climb leaderboards, earn badges and SSU Loyalty Tokens.

WIN
You know, that dream you have, the one that includes you playing at iconic stadiums like Camp Nou? Well, with Fan Tokens, that can become a reality.

But that's not all. As a Fan Token holder, you get to participate in exclusive in-app competitions and win VIP tickets to matches and events all year long. Signed memorabilia, meet & greets, and other exclusive experiences are also part of the package. All it takes is one Fan Token.

FAN REWARDS
At Socios.com, your loyalty means everything. That's why we've created Fan Rewards. A feature that allows engaged fans to redeem exclusive experiences, VIP tickets, signed merchandise, and more via SSU Loyalty Tokens.

You can collect SSU Loyalty Tokens for free via our augmented reality feature Token Hunt and earn even more by levelling up.

DIGITAL & PHYSICAL COLLECTIBLES
If you're a fan of digital collectibles, memorabilia and other collectibles? We've got you covered. Take part in special promotions to get your hands on unique Socios and team digital collectibles, rare memorabilia and more.

Ready to be more than a fan? Download the Socios.com App and get your first Fan Token now.
descriptionShort: Be more than a fan

title: Socios.com - Wallet & Tokens

creator: Mediarex Enterprises Limited
descriptionHtml:
Sports experiences money can't buy!

Can you imagine playing at the Spotify Camp Nou?
Getting the jersey worn and signed by a Manchester City player?
Helping your team design their new kit or choose the stadium music?
Having an espresso with legends like Paolo Maldini?

With Socios.com, you can make your mark on your favourite teams and get rewarded for your loyalty.

Over 150 sports teams have joined
Socios.com partners with over 150 major sports teams from all corners of the world. Our roster of teams includes Paris Saint-Germain F.C, F.C Barcelona, Manchester City, Juventus, AC Milan, F.C Internazionale Milano, Galatasaray, Vitality, Los Angeles Lakers, Golden State Warriors, Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team, UFC, and more will probably join by the time you finish reading this.

Earn huge Fan Rewards
Millions of sports fans are using Socios.com to get rewarded for their loyalty. Socios.com changes the way fans can interact with their favourite teams via the use of Fan Tokens. Fans are earning fantastic Fan Rewards like VIP tickets, money can’t buy experiences:

- Fly with the team
- Get game scored-balls
- Win free tickets
- Play at your favourite team’s stadium
- And more…

Get Fan Tokens
Fan Tokens are digital assets that allow fans to vote on official team polls like picking out stadium artwork, new kit designs and more. Fan Token holders have even picked the squad number for their team’s newest signings!

Score SSU Loyalty Tokens
Your main aim: to score SSU Loyalty Tokens. These tokens are your key to those amazing Fan Rewards. Earn them, then use them to redeem rewards. Earning SSUs is simple, all you need to do is engage with your favourite teams by:

- Hunting for free tokens in your neighbourhood and around the world
- Predicting & checking into matches
- Playing Games
- Trying Quizzes
- Voting in official team polls
- And much more…

Get ready to connect with fellow fans from across the globe and realise your sporting dreams when using Socios.com. Where will your Fan Tokens take you?
descriptionShort: Be more than a fan

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've diligently fixed pesky bugs and spruced up the feed for a better experience. Update now and enjoy smoother navigation!
